TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed IsolatedStorageContainment extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage) 的允許用法。

span.span: Specifies the permitted use of isolated storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隔離儲存區使用辨識項來判斷應用程式或元件使用的獨特的儲存體區域。Isolated storage uses evidence to determine a unique storage area for use by an application or component. 組件的識別唯一判斷虛擬檔案系統以供該組件的根。The identity of an assembly uniquely determines the root of a virtual file system for use by that assembly. 因此，而不是許多應用程式和共用通用的資源，例如檔案系統或登錄的元件，每個有自己原本指派給它的檔案區域。Thus, rather than many applications and components sharing a common resource such as the file system or registry, each has its own file area inherently assigned to it. 指派隔離儲存區時，會使用四個基本隔離範圍：Four basic isolation scopes are used when assigning isolated storage: - `User` 程式碼的範圍一律是根據目前的使用者。`User` - Code is always scoped according to the current user. 當不同使用者所執行相同的組件將會收到不同的存放區。The same assembly will receive different stores when being run by different users. - `Machine` 程式碼的範圍一律是根據電腦。`Machine` - Code is always scoped according to the machine. 當不同使用者所執行的相同電腦上相同的組件將會收到相同的存放區。The same assembly will receive the same stores when being run by different users on the same machine. - `Assembly` 程式碼由密碼編譯方面強式名稱 （例如，Microsoft.Office.\* 或 Microsoft.Office.Word），由發行者 （根據公開金鑰），由 URL (例如， http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm)、 站台，或是區域。`Assembly` - Code is identified cryptographically by strong name (for example, Microsoft.Office.\* or Microsoft.Office.Word), by publisher (based on public key), by URL (for example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm), by site, or by zone. - `Domain` 程式碼會識別根據相關聯的應用程式定義域的辨識項。`Domain` - Code is identified based on evidence associated with the application domain. 從網站的 URL，或藉由網頁的 URL、 網站或區域衍生 web 應用程式識別。Web application identity is derived from the site's URL, or by the Web page's URL, site, or zone. 本機的程式碼識別為基礎的應用程式的目錄路徑。Local code identity is based on the application directory path. 如需 URL、 網站和區域的定義，請參閱， ，和。For definitions of URL, site, and zone, see , , and . 這些身分識別會分組在一起，在此情況下之身分識別建立所需的隔離儲存區之前會套用一個接著一個。These identities are grouped together, in which case the identities are applied one after another until the desired isolated storage is created. 有效的群組是使用者 + 組件和使用者 + 組件 + 網域。The valid groupings are User+Assembly and User+Assembly+Domain. 身分識別此分組是許多不同的應用程式中很有用。This grouping of identities is useful in many different applications. 如果資料儲存網域、 使用者和組件，資料是只有程式碼中的私用組件可以存取的資料。If data is stored by domain, user, and assembly, the data is private in that only code in that assembly can access the data. 資料存放區也會隔離應用程式中執行，以便組件不代表一個潛在的溢位的公開給其他應用程式的資料。The data store is also isolated by the application in which it runs, so that the assembly does not represent a potential leak by exposing data to other applications. 組件和使用者隔離可用於多個應用程式; 適用於的使用者資料例如，授權的詳細資訊或使用者的個人資訊 （名稱、 驗證認證等等） 無關的應用程式。Isolation by assembly and user could be used for user data that applies across multiple applications; for example, license information, or a user's personal information (name, authentication credentials, and so on) that is independent of an application. 公開旗標，以決定是否允許應用程式使用隔離儲存區，因此，哪些身分識別的組合允許使用它。 exposes flags that determine whether an application is allowed to use isolated storage and, if so, which identity combinations are allowed to use it. 它也會決定是否允許應用程式將資訊儲存在漫遊的位置，可以與使用者 （Windows 漫遊使用者設定檔或資料夾重新導向必須設定）。It also determines whether an application is allowed to store information in a location that can roam with a user (Windows Roaming User Profiles or Folder Redirection must be configured). ## Examples 這個範例示範如何判斷這個組件中的程式碼需要 CLR同時也會示範如何撰寫和閱讀從隔離儲存區。This example shows how to tell the CLR that code in this assembly requires the and also demonstrates how to write and read from isolated storage. [!code-cpp[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/cpp/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/CS/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IsolatedStoragePermissionAttribute/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment AdministerIsolatedStorageByUser = int32(112)

summary.span: 使用者存放區的不限制管理功能。

span.span: Unlimited administration ability for the user store.

summary.span: 允許整個使用者存放區的瀏覽和刪除，但沒有使用者自己的定義域/組件識別以外的讀取權限。

span.span: Allows browsing and deletion of the entire user store, but not read access other than the user's own domain/assembly identity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment ApplicationIsolationByMachine = int32(69)

summary.span: 儲存區先由電腦隔離，然後再由應用程式隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by computer and then by application.

summary.span: 這為可在任何定義域內容中存取的應用程式提供資料存放區。

span.span: This provides a data store for the application that is accessible in any domain context.

summary.span: 每一個應用程式資料分隔需要額外的信任，因為它可能提供應用程式間的「通道」，而危及應用程式在某些特定網站的資料隔離。

span.span: The per-application data compartment requires additional trust because it potentially provides a "tunnel" between applications that could compromise the data isolation of applications in particular Web sites.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment ApplicationIsolationByRoamingUser = int32(101)

summary.span: 儲存區先由使用者隔離，再由應用程式辨識項隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by application evidence.

summary.span: 如果啟用 Windows 使用者資料漫遊，儲存區將會漫遊。

span.span: Storage will roam if Windows user data roaming is enabled.

summary.span: 這為可在任何定義域內容中存取的應用程式提供資料存放區。

span.span: This provides a data store for the application that is accessible in any domain context.

summary.span: 每一個應用程式資料分隔需要額外的信任，因為它可能提供應用程式間的「通道」，而危及應用程式在某些特定網站的資料隔離。

span.span: The per-application data compartment requires additional trust because it potentially provides a "tunnel" between applications that could compromise the data isolation of applications in particular Web sites.

summary.span: 儲存區先由使用者隔離，然後再由應用程式隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by application.

summary.span: 儲存區也由電腦隔離。

span.span: Storage is also isolated by computer.

summary.span: 這為可在任何定義域內容中存取的應用程式提供資料存放區。

span.span: This provides a data store for the application that is accessible in any domain context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment AssemblyIsolationByMachine = int32(64)

summary.span: 儲存區先由電腦隔離，然後再由程式碼組件隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by computer and then by code assembly.

summary.span: 這為可在任何定義域內容中存取的組件提供資料存放區。

span.span: This provides a data store for the assembly that is accessible in any domain context.

summary.span: 每一個組件資料分隔需要額外的信任，因為它可能提供應用程式間的「通道」，而危及應用程式在某些特定網站的資料隔離。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment AssemblyIsolationByRoamingUser = int32(96)

summary.span: 儲存區首先是先由使用者，再由組件辨識項所隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by assembly evidence.

summary.span: 如果啟用 Windows 使用者資料漫遊，儲存區將會漫遊。

span.span: Storage will roam if Windows user data roaming is enabled.

summary.span: 這為可在任何定義域內容中存取的組件提供資料存放區。

span.span: This provides a data store for the assembly that is accessible in any domain context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment AssemblyIsolationByUser = int32(32)

summary.span: 儲存區首先是由使用者，接著是由程式碼組件所隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by code assembly.

summary.span: 儲存區也由電腦隔離。

span.span: Storage is also isolated by computer.

summary.span: 這為可在任何定義域內容中存取的組件提供資料存放區。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment DomainIsolationByMachine = int32(48)

summary.span: 儲存區先由電腦隔離，然後再由網域和組件隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by computer and then by domain and assembly.

summary.span: 只能在同一個應用程式的內容中存取資料，並且只在相同電腦上執行時存取。

span.span: Data can only be accessed within the context of the same application and only when run on the same computer.

summary.span: 當協力廠商組件要保留私用資料存放區時，這是非常有用的。

span.span: This is helpful when a third-party assembly wants to keep a private data store.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment DomainIsolationByRoamingUser = int32(80)

summary.span: 儲存區首先是由使用者，接著是由網域和組件所隔離。

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by domain and assembly.

summary.span: 如果啟用 Windows 使用者資料漫遊，儲存區將會漫遊。

span.span: Storage will roam if Windows user data roaming is enabled.

summary.span: 只能在同一個應用程式的內容中存取資料，並且只在同一個使用者執行的時候。

span.span: Data can only be accessed within the context of the same application and only when run by the same user.

span.span: Storage is isolated first by user and then by domain and assembly.

summary.span: 儲存區也由電腦隔離。

span.span: Storage is also isolated by computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment None = int32(0)

summary.span: 不允許使用隔離儲存區。

span.span: Use of isolated storage is not allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment UnrestrictedIsolatedStorage = int32(240)

summary.span: 允許使用隔離儲存區，不受任何限制。

span.span: Use of isolated storage is allowed without restriction.

summary.span: 程式碼具有使用者存放區任何部分的完全存取權，無論定義域或組件的識別。

span.span: Code has full access to any part of the user store, regardless of the identity of the domain or assembly.

summary.span: 這個隔離儲存區的使用包括列舉隔離儲存區資料存放區的內容。

span.span: This use of isolated storage includes the ability to enumerate the contents of the isolated storage data store.
